Posts.Content: Jan 18, 2008 05:45PM rosewatergirl wrote: Alright...I called and made an appointment with Planned Parenthood for an exam.  I guess I have to go through them for a referral for a mammogram( I have no insurance).  That's another thing that scares me.  I'm a single mom who makes too much for Medicaid, but has no benefits from my employer.  Now is not the right time to try to find another job.  Are there any agencies that help fund diagnosis and treatment?  What about if I have to take time off of work?  How do I support myself and my 7 year old daughter?
Posts.Title: Terrified rosewatergirl Harley44
